channel.title: [PI] Wear Error
channel.description:
[code][1/30/14 10:55 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.wearItem(ItemAssista nt.java:1474) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.WearItem.processPacket(W earItem.java:38) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1643) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:137) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:160)[/code]
My server puts out the above error. I can't seem to find out why I looked at Line 1474, and 38. Here they are for reference:
int toRemove = c.playerEquipment[targetSlot]; // Line 1474
Full WearItem.java: [url=http://www.upload.ee/files/3876710/WearItem.java.html]http://www.upload.ee/files/3876710/WearItem.java.html[/url]
I don't really know what I can do to fix this error as the code doesn't have any noticeable problems with it.

item.title: [PI] Wear Error
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

TargetSlot is too high, add it to the array or do a check to make sure its below the array bounds before trying to get the value of the array.
ie,

int toRemove = -1; if (targetSlot < c.playerEquipment.length) { toRemove = c.playerEquipment[targetSlot]; } else { return; } // ...

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Wear Error
item.dc:creator: @MicroZoft MicroZoft
item.description:
@MicroZoft wrote:

[1/30/14 10:55 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.items.ItemAssistant.wearItem(ItemAssista nt.java:1474) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.packets.WearItem.processPacket(W earItem.java:38) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:138) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1643) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:137) [1/30/14 10:55 PM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:160)

My server puts out the above error. I can’t seem to find out why I looked at Line 1474, and 38. Here they are for reference:

int toRemove = c.playerEquipment[targetSlot]; // Line 1474

Full WearItem.java: http://www.upload.ee/files/3876710/WearItem.java.html

I don’t really know what I can do to fix this error as the code doesn’t have any noticeable problems with it.
